Key: Hey, Onii-sama! Yes, I am! What about you?
I was just passing by. What are you buying?

Oh. Some instant foods. I saw a sale, so I
thought I would stock up.

Ah, I see. Don't you get bored of eating
that stuff after a while? Let me make
you dinner sometime.

Are you freaking serious?! I can't wait to
eat your cooking!

(Mana smiled from ear to ear, as if she
was an ordinary girl. This was as good of
a time as any to ask.)

Oh, yeah. Mana, what's the most important
thing to you?

The most important thing, huh? I've never
freaking thought about it.

Well, if I could pick one thing, it might be you.
You're my only family.
I see. Thanks, Mana. You mean a lot to me, too.
Yeah! You're always on my mind!
Oh. The sale's about to start.
Ah, I see. Sorry for stopping you. Go ahead.

Okay! Hehehe... I'm freaking stoked I got to
talk to you like this.

(Family's the most important thing, huh?
She makes a good point.)
